CN.content:
Please identify the "Material Name" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The new polymer PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) was synthesized by coupling 3,6-di(2-bromothien-5-yl)-2 , 5dibutylpyrrolo[3,4-c] pyrrole-1,4-dione and 2,6-di(trimethyl- tin)-N-[1-(2 0 -ethylhexyl)-3-ethylheptanyl]dithieno[3,2-b : 2^0 ,3 0 -d]- pyrrole via a Stille reaction ( Scheme 1 ).

Let's think step by step.

| Material Name |
| ------------- |
| 3,6-di(2-bromothien-5-yl)-2,5-dibutylpyrrolo[3,4-c] pyrrole-1,4-dione |
| 2,6-di(trimethyl-tin)-N-[1-(2-ethylhexyl)-3-ethylheptanyl]dithieno[3,2-b:2^0 ,3 0 -d]- pyrrole |
| PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) |

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Material name" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Material Name".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Material Name |
| ------------- |
| 3,6-di(2-bromothien-5-yl)-2,5-dibutylpyrrolo[3,4-c] pyrrole-1,4-dione |
| 2,6-di(trimethyl-tin)-N-[1-(2-ethylhexyl)-3-ethylheptanyl]dithieno[3,2-b:2^0 ,3 0 -d]- pyrrole |
| PDTP - DTDPP(Bu) |

The other entities in the paragraph do not clearly refer to material names:

* The "was synthesized by" phrase is a description of the process, not a material name.
* "Coupling" is a process, not a material.
* "3,6-di(2-bromothien-5-yl)-2,5-dibutylpyrrolo[3,4-c] pyrrole-1,4-dione and 2,6-di(trimethyl-tin)-N-[1-(2-ethylhexyl)-3-ethylheptanyl]dithieno[3,2-b:2^0 ,3 0 -d]- pyrrole" are the reactants in the synthesis process, but they are the material names.
* "Via a Stille reaction" is a description of the synthesis method, not a material name.
* "Scheme 1" is a diagram or illustration, not a material name.
